name: Crazy Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding (3 ¾ oz.)
½ cup salad oil (or ½ cup apple sauce)
2 or 3 apples – thickly sliced into 1 tsp. cinnamon and 4 tsp. sugar
1 cup blueberries + ¼ cup sugar, ¼ tsp. cinnamon
instructions: Stir over fire until melted
Add 1 cup hot water – then add
Sift together – 3 cups flour (cake or regular) and 2 tsp. Baking powder
Add – 2 tsp. Vanilla
Stir well –
Add 1 cup hot water with 2 tsp. Baking soda dissolved.
Bake in 350 oven – 9x13 pan 35-40 minutes.
NANA WOLFF’S POOR MAN’S FRUIT CAKE
Boil above ingredients 5 mins.  When cool add 2 tsp. Baking soda dissolved in one tbsp. lukewarm water.
Add 2 cups flour, ½ cup chopped nut meats, ½ jar candied cherries and ½ jar candied pineapple.  Mix fruit and nuts with flour.
Bake at least 1 ½ hours in greased and floured tube pan at 325. Double all ingredients for tube pan. Single recipe fits in 8x8 pans.
EASY APPLE COFFEE CAKE – NANA WOLFF
Combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, sour cream and oil – beat 5 minutes
Pour ½ of batter into a greased 10” tube pan
Arrange ½ of apple slices on top and sprinkle with ½ mix of nuts, sugar and cinnamon
Cover with remaining batter
Add remaining apples and top with rest of sugar mixture
Bake at 350 for 1 hour
Cool in pan for 30 minutes
MARY BOWMAN – JEWISH APPLE CAKE
Mix all ingredients, except apples and cinnamon mixture, in a bowl.
Beat 10 minutes.
Layer batter and apples.
Bake 350 – 60 to 70 minutes in a greased and floured tube pan.
Mom got this from Aunt Gracie Gaetani
AUNT MARY’S BLUEBERRY CAKE
Grease and flour 13x9 pan.
Sift flour, salt, baking powder – set aside
Cream shortening, sugar, and eggs, vanilla in a mixer or by hand.
Slowly add dry ingredients with milk and beat 3 minutes.
Fold in 1-cup blueberries.
Pour in pan
Bake 350 – about 40-50 minutes.
